cards.flavor_text: [i]The shining weapon of Hallowed Order knights.[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Newly-Entrusted Knight enters, create a Quest token. [i](It's a D{2} battle protected by an opponent of your choice. When it's defeated, target player draws a card. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]Emi eyed the knight, and that familiar armor pattern. “Such a shame,” she sighed, “for something so precious to die so young.”[/i]
cards.notes: Emi eyed the knight, and that familiar armor pattern. “Such a shame,” she sighed, “for something so precious to die so young.”

cards.rules_text: When Taken by Overgrowth enters, exile another target nonland permanent until Taken by Overgrowth leaves the battlefield.

—Avent, outer town scout[/i]

cards.flavor_text:
[i]“A budding demon does nothing in a sleeping body. I'd do anything to cure her.”
—Nel, outer town mage[/i]

cards.rules_text: Destroy target creature. If that creature was a Demon, you lose 4 life unless you pay {2}.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Now,” Emi admitted, kneeling in front of the outsider Avis, “you understand what Clara and I had done. Now, you have no reason to forgive me.”[/i]

“Now,” Emi admitted, kneeling in front of the outsider Avis, “you understand what Clara and I had done. Now, you have no reason to forgive me.”

Menace
When Dark-Stained Puppet enters, each opponent loses 3 life unless they discard a card or sacrifice a creature.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a nonland permanent.
Draw two cards. Create a Quest token. [i](It's a D{2} battle protected by an opponent of your choice. When it's defeated, target player draws a card. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.)[/i]

[i]Revolt[/i] — At the beginning of your end step, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Hallowed Blackguard. Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]While the others bring hope to the innocent, she brings fear to the demons.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Army's Advance enters, you may discard a card. If you do, draw two cards.
{R}, Sacrifice Army's Advance: Put a trample counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
When Bloodied Bandit enters, it deals 2 damage to target player, planeswalker, or battle.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The demons destroyed everything they could. Outside the cities, we need to be just as ruthless.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Senses Overwhelmed deals 6 damage to target creature and 2 damage to up to one other target token.
cards.flavor_text: [i]In all her years of fighting, Avis had never felt pain like a demon's touch.[/i]

Vital Channeler can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

cards.flavor_text: [i]“Strength in itself can be forged like steel, to fight and to protect.”[/i]

cards.notes: Not all PLACE constructs end up good.

cards.rules_text:
Menace
Whenever Lacerator Unit or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life. Then if that creature wasn't a token, create a 1/1 Construct artifact creature token.

When Muldan Engineering enters, create a 1/1 Construct artifact creature token. When you do, attach up to one target Equipment you control to that token.
Equipped creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain menace.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Shane always felt at home with his machines.[/i]

At the beginning of your end step, draw a card for each card you've drawn each turn.

Avis attacks each turn if able.
Whenever Avis attacks, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, put a first strike counter on her. If she already has first strike, instead put your choice of a +1/+1 counter or a double strike counter on her.
{1}{R}: Target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.

Flash

cards.notes:
Seize divinity (8: You get an Apotheosis emblem with “At the beginning of your end step, draw a card.” Each creature you tap for this ability pays for 1. Activate only if you don't have Apotheosis.)
At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target noncreature card from your graveyard. Copy it. You may cast the copy. If you have Apotheosis, the copy costs 4 less.

Seize divinity (8: You get an Apotheosis emblem with “At the beginning of your end step, draw a card.” Each creature you tap for this ability pays for 1. Activate only if you don't have Apotheosis.)
Noncreature spells you cast cost 1 less. If you have Apotheosis, instead they cost 2 less.

cards.rules_text:
Reach
[i]Revolt[/i] — At the beginning of your end step, Burning-Heart Adherent deals 1 damage to each opponent. If a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, instead Burning-Heart Adherent deals 2 damage to each opponent.

When Hallowed Memorial enters, create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.
{4}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Hallowed Memorial: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

Deathtouch
[i]Revolt[/i] — Whenever Caustic Blade-Dancer attacks, if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn, another target attacking creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“If you're going to be stuck protecting the town, might as well put some joy into it.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever Shane attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
{1}{UB}, Discard a card: Exile target artifact card from your graveyard. Copy it. You may cast the copy [i](still paying its mana cost)[/i]. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I'm looking for something to protect my city.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of your second main phase, the next spell you cast this turn gains instigate. [i](It costs {1} less for each creature you attacked with this turn.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, if you've cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater this turn, create a 3/2 colorless Construct artifact creature token.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Behind me! We're here to bring the world hope!”[/i]
cards.notes: FT we're going to save the world
